meanings.definition: A dress made of a knitted fabric, typically resembling a sweater.
meanings.sent1: She wore a cozy sweaterdress to the winter party.
meanings.sent2: The sweaterdress she bought was a lovely shade of blue.
meanings.sent3: The sweaterdress looked like it could keep a snowman warm!
meanings.sent4: Her sweaterdress was a hug from a cloud on a chilly day.
meanings.sent5: The sweaterdress felt like a warm embrace on a cold morning.

meanings.definition: To dress oneself in a garment that combines the features of a sweater and a dress.
meanings.sent1: She decided to sweaterdress for the occasion.
meanings.sent2: I sweaterdressed quickly before heading out.
meanings.sent3: He sweaterdresses like a fashion icon!
meanings.sent4: Sweaterdressing is the best way to stay stylish and warm.
meanings.sent5: They always sweaterdress when the weather gets chilly.
